price: Wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻdi dwuma pa no, nokorε sε Yεde wͻn bεka apapafoͻ no ho (wͻ Soro aheman no mu).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَنُدۡخِلَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lanud'khilannahum fī al-ṣāliḥīna
